Running Calculator

Help and Documentation

Welcome to the Running Calculator! Here's how to use it:

  • Enter any two of Distance, Time, or Pace to calculate the third.
  • Use the shortcut buttons for popular distances.
  • Time can be entered as HH:MM:SS, MM:SS, or with units (e.g., 1h30m).
  • Pace can be entered as MM:SS or with units (e.g., 5m30s per km).
  • The pace gauge shows how your pace compares to world-class and average runners.

If you have any feedback or encounter issues, please contact us.
